description:
A priest saves a town from sacrificing another daughter, a lazy man learns hard work, and a lazier man learns nothing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shippei Tarou / Ten ni Nobotta Musuko / Bushou Kurabe
Shippei-Tarou / The Son Who Went Up to Heaven / Who`s the Laziest?
しっぺい太郎 / 天にのぼった息子 / 無精くらべ
